Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Blood Coagulation Disorders/Coagulation Protein Disorders/Factor VII Deficiency
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: An autosomal recessive characteristic or a coagulation disorder acquired in association with VITAMIN K DEFICIENCY. FACTOR VII is a Vitamin K dependent glycoprotein essential to the extrinsic pathway of coagulation.
